\subsection*{2.1 GDP}

```{r GDP-bbl}
library(plotly)
GDP <- WHR20 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = `Ladder score`, 
               y = `Logged GDP per capita`, 
               size = `Ladder score`, 
               color =`Regional indicator`,
               stroke = `Country name`)) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_size(range = c(.3,6), name="Ladder score")
ggplotly(GDP)
```

```{r GDP-boxp}
WHR20 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = `Ladder score`, 
               y = `Logged GDP per capita`, 
               color =`Regional indicator`)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
